original: @#/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba ro sreg las kyi phreng ba/
analyzed: @#/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba ro sreg las kyi phreng ba/
translated: The Garland of Ritual Actions of the Cremation of the Web of Illusion

original: @#/_/bcom ldan 'das thugs rje'i 'dren pa byed pa po la phyag 'tshhal
analyzed: @#/_/bcom ldan 'das thugs rje'i 'dren pa byed pa po la phyag 'tshhal
translated: Homage to the Bhagavān, the compassionate guide, the creator!🔽In order to burn the web of concepts and🔽purify the fabricated through compassionate means,

analyzed: pa'i dra ba bsal nas ni/_/sku lnga lhun gyis 'grub par shog_/dang po de nyid
translated: may the five kāyas be spontaneously accomplished.🔽First, the placement of the corpse,

analyzed: lus bzhag pa/_/bgegs bskrad pa dang bcas pa dang /_/gdags dang sbyang

analyzed: dang dbang bskur dang /_/thab khung sreg khang slob dpon dang /_/las gzhung

analyzed: sbyin sreg bsdu bas te/_/lnga gnyis cig gis don rdzogs 'gyur/_/mdor
translated: with five pairs of one, the purpose will be accomplished.🔽This is considered the general meaning in brief.

original: bsdus spyi yi don du 'dod/_/de dag rgyas par bshad pa ni/_/ci nus pa yis
analyzed: bsdus spyi yi don du 'dod/_/de dag rgyas par bshad pa ni/_/ci nus pa yis
translated: The extensive explanation of those🔽is as much as one is able.

original: rnam par dbye/_/e ram khams gsum ma lus kun/_/za byed 'bar ba'i dkyil
analyzed: rnam par dbye/_/e ram khams gsum ma lus kun/_/za byed 'bar ba'i dkyil
translated: The three realms are all consumed by the blazing mandala of the🔽devourer.🔽Protect the body, and in the innate perfection,🔽be happy, strike, conquer, and radiate,🔽and be nondual with the support.

original: 'khor gyis/_/khog srungs lhan cig skyes rdzogs la/_/bdeg dang bsnun dang gzhom pa dang /_/'phros te rten la gnyis med bya/_/srung ba'i 'khor lo'i cho

analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba ro sreg las kyi phreng ba
translated: The garland of actions of the cremation of the web of illusion🔽should be performed, and the commitment being should be protected and placed.

analyzed: ga yis/_/dam tshhig sems dpa' srungs te bzhag_/de ltar grangs dang zhag
translated: In that way, the number and days🔽should be pressed down again and again.

analyzed: dus su/_/yang dang yang du gnan te bya/_/khrus dang rgyan dang byugs pas te/_/
translated: With bathing, ornaments, and anointing,🔽the outer and inner two fives

analyzed: phyi dang nang gi lnga gnyis la/_/brgya pa gnyis dang dag pa ni/_/chu la lan
translated: are purified with the two hundreds,🔽and the many times of the mantra

analyzed: grangs mang bzlas te/_/mchod rten de la bkru bar bya/_/mi 'chi bcu phyed
translated: are recited over the water and used to wash the stupa.🔽The undying half

analyzed: spos mar dang /_/dri yis de la yang dag byug_/zhun chen khu bar btshos pa yi//
translated: is anointed with incense and perfume.

analyzed: ras kyis steng nas yang dag bkri /_/spos mar thor lcog de la dkon/_/
translated: and put a wick in the oil lamp.🔽Hang a necklace of ornaments🔽on the neck of the vase.

analyzed: mgul do rgyan yang gdags par bya/_/phung po lnga yi gnas dag du/_/rgyal ba
translated: In the places of the five aggregates,🔽array the seals of the five victorious families.

analyzed: rigs lnga'i phyag rgya dgod/_/rtsha ru yum lnga'i phyag rgya dgod/_/rnam shes dbang
translated: In the five places, array the seals of the five mothers.🔽In the sense organs and their objects,

analyzed: po yul rnams su/_/sems dpa' sems ma 'dzom pa dang /_/'jom ma rim par dgod do zhes/_/mnyam pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa yin/_/rgyu drug 'khor

analyzed: ba'i gnas rnams su/_/thub drug sa bon dgod pa yin/_/kun bzangs yab

original: yum de bzhin te/_/sdong bu re la lha rnams kyi/_/ma nor rtsha ba'i snying po dag_/
analyzed: yum de bzhin te/_/sdong bu re la lha rnams kyi/_/ma nor rtsha ba'i snying po dag_/
translated: On each of the branches, the seeds of the deities🔽are written on a large piece of cloth and hung.

original: ras chen rgyu las byas te gdags/_/mya ngan 'das par gsungs pa yin/_/ro
analyzed: ras chen rgyu las byas te gdags/_/mya ngan 'das par gsungs pa yin/_/ro
translated: This is said to be the nirvana.🔽On the outer bark of the corpse,🔽array the seeds of the six classes of beings.

original: yi phyi rol shun pa la/_/'gro drug sa bon bkod nas ni/_/'od zer 'phro
analyzed: yi phyi rol shun pa la/_/'gro drug sa bon bkod nas ni/_/'od zer 'phro
translated: Then, light rays radiate

original: 'du'i sbyor ba yis/_/rim gyis sbyang ba'i las su bya/_/dbu rgyan cod pan
analyzed: 'du'i sbyor ba yis/_/rim gyis sbyang ba'i las su bya/_/dbu rgyan cod pan
translated: The work of gradually purifying with the application of the🔽fire offering is as follows:

original: 'phreng ba dang /_/rdo rje dri _bu la sogs pa/_/dbang mchog byin la stegs la🔽bzhag_/de nas me thab tsham bya ba/_/khru bzhi do yi tshhang byas la/_/mthur
analyzed: 'phreng ba dang /_/rdo rje dri _bu la sogs pa/_/dbang mchog byin la stegs la bzhag_/de nas me thab tsham bya ba/_/khru bzhi do yi tshhang byas la/_/mthur
translated: Having given the supreme empowerment of the crown, diadem,🔽garland,🔽vajra, bell, and so on, place the disciple on the seat.🔽Then, the hearth should be dug four cubits deep and🔽four cubits wide, and the mandala of the fire offering

original: du brus te dkyil 'khor du/_/za byed dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dgod/_/rdo rje me
analyzed: du brus te dkyil 'khor du/_/za byed dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dgod/_/rdo rje me

original: ris mtshhan pa ni/_/thabs _khung yin par gsal bar gsungs/_/phyi rol ka
analyzed: ris mtshhan pa ni/_/thabs _khung yin par gsal bar gsungs/_/phyi rol ka
translated: It is clearly taught that the mandala of the fire offering🔽is marked with a vajra and a fire.🔽Having dug four corners outside,

original: ba bzhi btshugs la/_/'og ma sgrengs pas sum brtshegs _bya/_/bar ba shing gi
analyzed: ba bzhi btshugs la/_/'og ma sgrengs pas sum brtshegs _bya/_/bar ba shing gi
translated: the three layers should be made by raising the lower [part].🔽In the center of the middle [part],🔽which is made of wood,

original: rdzas dbus su/_/pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/_/khro bo brgyad kyi snying por
analyzed: rdzas dbus su/_/pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/_/khro bo brgyad kyi snying por
translated: there is an eight-petaled lotus with the essence of the eight🔽wrathful ones.🔽In the center, the seed of fire is placed.

original: ldan/_/dbus su me yi sa bon dgod/_/bzhin phyogs shar du bstan te
analyzed: ldan/_/dbus su me yi sa bon dgod/_/bzhin phyogs shar du bstan te
translated: The face is placed facing east.🔽Having attached the dhāraṇī thread to the corpse,

original: dgod/_/ro la gzungs thag btags nas ni/_/blo kar bzhi nas drangs
analyzed: dgod/_/ro la gzungs thag btags nas ni/_/blo kar bzhi nas drangs
translated: one should be drawn from the four directions.

original: byas la/_/bla ma bzhi'i phyag du gtad/_/sum rtsheg yang thog chen po der/_/
analyzed: byas la/_/bla ma bzhi'i phyag du gtad/_/sum rtsheg yang thog chen po der/_/
translated: and the four gurus should be placed in the hands of the deceased.

original: ras sam gro ga shing shun la/_/thugs rje dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/_/lding
analyzed: ras sam gro ga shing shun la/_/thugs rje dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/_/lding
translated: On a piece of cloth, birch bark, or paper, the forty-two mandalas of compassion should be drawn🔽and hung in the highest part of the house.

original: bur byas te gdags par bya/_/de nas rdo rje rgyal po yis/_/rang bzhin me yi🔽'phro 'du bya/_/rdo rje kar ma las mkhan gyis/_/srung dang skrad pa nas rtshams
analyzed: bur byas te gdags par bya/_/de nas rdo rje rgyal po yis/_/rang bzhin me yi 'phro 'du bya/_/rdo rje kar ma las mkhan gyis/_/srung dang skrad pa nas rtshams
translated: Then the vajra king should perform the emanation and reabsorption of the fire of the nature🔽of the deceased. The vajra karma master should perform the protection, the expulsion, and the burning,🔽and complete the garland of rites.

original: te/_/las kyi 'phreng ba rdzogs par bya/_/rdo rje rgyal po bla ma yis/_/
analyzed: te/_/las kyi 'phreng ba rdzogs par bya/_/rdo rje rgyal po bla ma yis/_/
translated: The guru vajra king should confess the faults of the corpse,

original: mtshhams med lnga dang nye ba lnga/_/lci ba bzhi dag la sogs pa/_/ro yi nyes pa🔽sgrang zhing bshags/_/rdo rje skabs sbyor bla ma des/_/skabs skabs dag tu
analyzed: mtshhams med lnga dang nye ba lnga/_/lci ba bzhi dag la sogs pa/_/ro yi nyes pa sgrang zhing bshags/_/rdo rje skabs sbyor bla ma des/_/skabs skabs dag tu
translated: such as the five great and five minor sins, and the four heavy ones.🔽The guru vajra interval should make offerings🔽from time to time.🔽The one who knows the auspicious place should make aspirations.

original: mchod pa dbul/_/bkra shis gnas kyis smon lam btab/_/skabs sam kun
analyzed: mchod pa dbul/_/bkra shis gnas kyis smon lam btab/_/skabs sam kun
translated: The one who knows the auspicious time should make aspirations.

original: gyi 'jug du gdab/_/rdo rje grangs kyi ltang 'dzin pas/_/grangs bzung dkar
analyzed: gyi 'jug du gdab/_/rdo rje grangs kyi ltang 'dzin pas/_/grangs bzung dkar
translated: The one who keeps the vajra count should count the number of times the deceased’s name is recited.

original: byang bla mar dbul/_/sdig pa'i gnag byang bshags shing sreg_/bzlas brjod
analyzed: byang bla mar dbul/_/sdig pa'i gnag byang bshags shing sreg_/bzlas brjod
translated: purify the darkness of sins, and burn them.🔽The remaining recitations

original: 'phro 'dus rtog tshhogs rnams/_/sbyangs te rang rang lha ru brlab/_/tshhogs
analyzed: 'phro 'dus rtog tshhogs rnams/_/sbyangs te rang rang lha ru brlab/_/tshhogs
translated: purify the hosts of thoughts, and you bless them as the individual deities.🔽All the heaps and articles of offering🔽appear in stages in front of you.

original: dang yo byad mchod pa kun/_/rim pas mdun du snang byas la/_/de las ri
analyzed: dang yo byad mchod pa kun/_/rim pas mdun du snang byas la/_/de las ri
translated: From them,🔽the fire is generated from ram, and the nature of the fire is invited and dissolves.

original: skyed ram las me/_/skyed de rang bzhin spyan drangs bstim/_/i li u li sta pa
analyzed: skyed ram las me/_/skyed de rang bzhin spyan drangs bstim/_/i li u li sta pa
translated: Eli uli sta🔽va🔽is applied in the context of the offering of the tsok.

original: tis/_/tshhogs kyi mchod pa skabs su sbyar/_/mchod dang stong pa rim pa
analyzed: tis/_/tshhogs kyi mchod pa skabs su sbyar/_/mchod dang stong pa rim pa
translated: The offering and emptiness are in stages,

original: bzhin/_/me yi lto bar gzhal yas khang /_/lha dang bcas pa rim par skyed/_/
analyzed: bzhin/_/me yi lto bar gzhal yas khang /_/lha dang bcas pa rim par skyed/_/

original: gong gi dkyil 'khor gsal btab la/_/gnyis su med par bstim byas la/_/
analyzed: gong gi dkyil 'khor gsal btab la/_/gnyis su med par bstim byas la/_/
translated: The maṇḍala above is visualized and dissolves into the fire.

original: mchod pa'i rim pa gong ma bzhin/_/stong pa la sogs de dang mtshhungs/_/me
analyzed: mchod pa'i rim pa gong ma bzhin/_/stong pa la sogs de dang mtshhungs/_/me
translated: The stages of offering are the same as above, and the emptiness and so on are the same as that.🔽The signs of the fire and the good and bad omens

original: yi ltas dang bzang dang ngan/_/rim pa bzhin du brtag par bya/_/de nas rdo
analyzed: yi ltas dang bzang dang ngan/_/rim pa bzhin du brtag par bya/_/de nas rdo
translated: are examined in stages.🔽Then, the torma is offered to the direction protectors.

original: rje bsdu ba yis/_/rim pa bzhin du sdus byas la/_/dam pa yin na sku gdung
analyzed: rje bsdu ba yis/_/rim pa bzhin du sdus byas la/_/dam pa yin na sku gdung
translated: if it is a holy being, the relics🔽will be permanent.

analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba ro sreg las kyi phreng ba
translated: The Garland of Ritual Actions of the Cremation of the Web of Illusions🔽says:🔽Gather the remaining remains and make a stupa,

analyzed: rtag_/lhag ma bsdus la mchod rten nam/_/sku 'am gtshug lag zhal zhal lam/

analyzed: thad ka'i ri mo bya ba 'am/_/sa dang bsres la ri lu bya/_/sbyin sreg bya bas
translated: The wise should perform the fire offering.🔽Then, gather the remains, make offerings,

analyzed: mkhas pas bshad/_/de nas bsdu dang phyag pa dang /_/gshegs su gsol ba
translated: and request the departure.🔽Mix the ashes with music

original: rim bzhin bya/_/tshhon rtshi bsdus te rol mo yis/_/rgya mtshho chen por skyal te
analyzed: rim bzhin bya/_/tshhon rtshi bsdus te rol mo yis/_/rgya mtshho chen por skyal te
translated: and cast them into the great ocean.🔽Sentient beings of samsara are extremely afflicted

original: gtang /_/'khor ba'i sems can log rtog 'khrul pas shin tu nyon mongs
analyzed: gtang /_/'khor ba'i sems can log rtog 'khrul pas shin tu nyon mongs
translated: by the confusion of wrong ideas.

analyzed: bcas pa des_/_/dral cing sreg dang brdos bcas sbyang phyir dri med bshes
translated: In order to destroy, burn, and purify them,🔽the stainless kinsmen, the compassionate ones,

original: gnyen gdung ba dag gis kyang /_/sgyu 'phrul rtogs dka' rngam pa rgya mtshho'i
analyzed: gnyen gdung ba dag gis kyang /_/sgyu 'phrul rtogs dka' rngam pa rgya mtshho'i
translated: with the ocean of wrathful ones difficult to realize,

original: kyi phreng ba rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: kyi phreng ba rdzogs so//_//
translated: The garland of actions from the cremation ground of magical nets is complete.

original: slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa'o/_/
analyzed: slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa'o/_/
